org.itemscript.core.values
Interface JsonFactory

All Known Subinterfaces:
JsonSystem
All Known Implementing Classes:
GwtJsonFactory, ItemscriptFactory, ItemscriptSystem, StandardJsonFactory
public interface JsonFactory

A JsonFactory is used to create JsonValues, and to convert from native Java types to JsonValues.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

          Create a new empty JsonArray.

parse

JsonValue parse(java.lang.String json)
Parse the given string as JSON. Throws an exception if the JSON cannot be parsed.

Parameters:
json - The String to parse.
Returns:
The JsonValue parsed from the string.

parseReader

JsonValue parseReader(java.lang.Object reader)
Parse the given Reader as JSON. Note that this takes an Object argument for compatibility with GWT.

Parameters:
reader - The Reader to parse.
Returns:
The JsonValue parsed from the Reader.
